version_description:
-Introducing bundles! Get up to 90% more by purchasing packs of cars & mechanics.
-Each mechanic in your crew permanently boosts your Coin earnings.
-Added a Retry icon at the end of the race.
-New Daily Race event: Race with a different car

-Introducing bundles! Get up to 90% more by purchasing packs of cars & mechanics.
-Each mechanic in your crew permanently boosts your Coin earnings.
-Added a Retry icon at the end of the race.
-New Daily Race event: Race with a different car

RACE THE W MOTORS LYKAN HYPERSPORT:
- The most exclusive car in the world, worth $3.4 million
- 420 diamonds encrusted into the front lights
- Only 7 cars will ever be produced

GET READY FOR A NEW LEVEL OF TEAM RACING:
- Win great Prize

EXCLUSIVE CARS TO EXPAND YOUR COLLECTION
- Take control of the reinvented muscle car, the 2015 FORD MUSTANG
- Dust the competition with the super-aggressive MERCEDES-BENZ A 45 AMG
- Legends never die, so neither does the 1974 NISSAN DATSUN 260Z<

▶ Enjoy more thrilling competition with the BRAND-NEW AI
▶ Collect these SPEED BEASTS:
- Savage Rivale Roadyacht GTS
- Lamborghini Aventador LP 700-4
- Lamborghini Veneno
- Lamborghini Countach 25th Anniversary
